channel.title: After Rain - Bacs
channel.description: I finished this track just yesterday. I was playing around with “Crude” from Martland Guitars Pack. I was trying to learn how to play Guitar in Midi form which is fun learning with Auxy App. And added in some tweaks and deep bass in throughout the song. I actually did two bass form which it did a perfect fit especially in the chorus. Vocals from the old pack. I’m still debating whether this is gonna be the final version which I did a uploaded one demo before the this one but im quite liking the outcome. Hope you guys like it. Send me some feedback btw :slight_smile: https://soundcloud.com/bacs-molina17-183209610/after-rain-1 ![image|500x500](upload://oqxlqYEoaitizLwwFs3KV8znVNX.jpeg)

item.title: After Rain - Bacs
item.dc:creator: packfaces
item.description:
I finished this track just yesterday. I was playing around with “Crude” from Martland Guitars Pack. I was trying to learn how to play Guitar in Midi form which is fun learning with Auxy App. And added in some tweaks and deep bass in throughout the song. I actually did two bass form which it did a perfect fit especially in the chorus. Vocals from the old pack. I’m still debating whether this is gonna be the final version which I did a uploaded one demo before the this one but im quite liking the outcome. Hope you guys like it. Send me some feedback btw
https://soundcloud.com/bacs-molina17-183209610/after-rain-1
